data.eml:eml: A revision of the genera and species of the Neotropical family Mesembrinellidae (Diptera: Oestroidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Whitworth, Terry L., Yusseff-Vanegas, Sohath (2019): A revision of the genera and species of the Neotropical family Mesembrinellidae (Diptera: Oestroidea). Zootaxa 4659 (1): 1-146, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4659.1.1
